name: Dame Tu Cosita's Education and Learning
name_original: Dame Tu Cosita's Education and Learning
description:
Do you like memes?

Well welcome to the meme-like educational game called Dame Tu Cosita's Education and Learning! You get to meet the green and bald meme called Dame Tu Cosita, who educates you in spelling. Spell what he asks you to spell and he will give you something awes̖͞o͎̝m̟͙͚e̬̖̹̩. ̬̻̙̼̺̫͢M̞̬̥e̢̥̭̺͎e͏t̰̣̫͞ ͚̰̬ͅh҉͍i̲̼̲͕̺͈s̼̰ ̶p͈̦̩e̕t͎̻̭̱ ̴̬̺ͅc̢͔̙̰͇͍̪o̮͚͎w̼̰͟ ̸n͉̝͙̘̫a͖m̵͎e̙̮̫D̪̖̜͍̻̹ ̡t͖̻̘͜O̰̰͎̣̹͉̬M̭͇͔̜̹̀ Don't think of this as a meme. If you make Dame Tu Cosita angry, he will get your little thing. Just trust me.

Credit goes to:
Mystman12 for making Baldi's Basics.
El Chombo for making Dame Tu Cosita.
Dante Garner for developing this game.
Jia Liang for giving Dante the idea of this game.
Google Chrome for requesting the images.

Mac version coming out Soon!
